Welcome User
Edit Profile Logout
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { AccountService } from '../_services/account.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav-menu', templateUrl: './nav-menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav-menu.component.css'], }) export class NavMenuComponent { model: any = {}; loggedIn = false; constructor(private accountService: AccountService) {} login() { this.accountService.login(this.model).subscribe({ next: (response) => { console.log(response); this.loggedIn = true; }, error: (error) => console.log(error), }); } logout() { this.loggedIn = false; } }
